nsinfo-nslink-emptypagename: Invalid link - page name is empty.
nsinfo-nslist-pagetext: The following table lists the namespace information for the [https://en.uesp.net/wiki/Project:NSInfo NSInfo] extension. Note that only table and row formatting are supported; do '''not''' use cell formatting (| style=... | Text) or things will break. Cells may be separated either by || on the same line or by | on a new line, as usual. NS_BASE must always be specified. Other values that aren't specified will default to NS_BASE except as follows: {| class=wikitable ! NS_ID | upper-case NS_BASE |- ! NS_MAINPAGE | NS_BASE + : or \ + NS_NAME |- ! NS_TRAIL |[[NS_MAINPAGE{{Pipe}}NS_NAME]] |} ==Namespaces== {| class="wikitable sortable" id=nsinfo-table ! NS_BASE !! NS_ID !! NS_PARENT !! NS_NAME !! NS_MAINPAGE !! NS_CATEGORY !! NS_TRAIL !! GAMESPACE |- $1 |}
